overview: Some guys just can’t decide whether it’s best to top or best to bottom – and who can blame them? Why pigeon-hole yourself when there’s so much pleasure to be enjoyed from both roles? So join this bevy of decidedly undecided buddies as they fuck and get fucked in equal measure. Tony Conrad, Martin Rivers and Titus Snow join forces for a second topsy-turvy, flip-flopping ride that has but one guarantee – namely, a jizz-sodden climax from every dick involved!
title: Flip-Flopping Fuckers 2
